name: gluttony

effect.scarlet_violet: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.

short_effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: If the Pokémon is holding a Berry to be eaten when its HP is low, it will instead eat the Berry when its HP drops to half or less.
